runs.comm: fullish, on the middle and leg, flicked over square-leg
cuts in to the middle stump line, dabbed to midwicket
length delivery outside off stump, Dilshan tries to cut but it keeps low and shoots past the bat
slower one around off stump line, nudged to point
in the channel outside off and Dilshan is beaten on the forward defensive stroke
around the off stump line, nudged to the off side
Pure unadulterated rubbish ball. It was short in length and just outside leg stump. Mahela plays an elegant leg glance to help himself to a boundary
leans forward to play a lovely cover drive but can't pierce the field
shortish, outside off stump, run down to third man
full in length outside off, square driven to point where Nathan makes an half-stop
around the off stump line, tapped towards covers for a single
really full delivery outside off stump, Hopkins (the wicketkeeper) collects
jumps down the track and goes for the big lofted hit over the bowler but is beaten by the change of pace. The ball gently wafts past the off stump
short in length just outside off stump, dabbed to the off side
Awesome! Mahela walks down the track and goes towards the off side, reaches out to pick up the length delivery from outside off and lift it over wide midwicket boundary. Gorgeous timing.
outside off stump, dabbed behind the wicket on the off side
Shot! It was short in length outside off, it cut in but Mahela adjusted to the movement and the bounce by waiting and steering it between backward point and short third man
gets forward to defend the back-of-length delivery
fullish, deflected to short midwicket
gets behind the line to push a length delivery to mid-off
pushes this one to covers
length delivery outside off stump, pushed to point
gets a single down to deep square-leg
The big wicket is down. Mahela backs away to try blast it through covers but hits it straight to Brendon McCullum at short cover.
outside off stump, dabbed towards point
short in length on the pads, tucked wide of midwicket for a single
around the off and middle line, pushed out to the off side
short in length and outside off stump, Dilshan goes for the cut but is beaten by the lack of bounce
around the off stump line, punched to point region for a single
Tonked! Full delivery on middle and leg and Perera swings it to wide long-on boundary
goes for the paddle-scoop but misses it ... and the ball goes down leg for a bye
from round the stumps, on the middle, pushed down the track
length delivery on the middle, eased past the non striker
goes for the pull but misses and is struck on the pad. It was going down the leg side
on a length, around off stump, pushed to covers
outside off stump, cut down to deep point region
gets forward to defend to short cover
tossed outside off, hit hard but straight to Vettori at shrot cover
just outside off stump, tapped to the off side
around the off side, pushed to the off side
works this past square-leg
arm ball, bunted down to the on side .. Vettori makes a half-stop
goes back to clip the arm ball wide of deep midwicket for couple of runs
leans forward to ping long-off
around the off stump line, tapped to backward point
on the off stump line, punched towards deep cover
on the middle and leg line, flicked for a single
short in length, wristed towards deep midwicket for a single
on the middle stump line, punched to short cover
pings the sweeper cover for a single
Blasted! It was a length delivery outside off and Perera crashes it hard through the line and swung it well to the right of long-on
Whack! He fetched the slower one from outside off and walloped it over wide long-on boundary
the slow bouncer and it sails high over the batsman on the leg stump line
length delivery outside off stump line, Perera goes for the swing and edges it to fine-leg region
just outside off stump, tries to cut but is beaten
stays back to punch to deep cover
on the off and middle line, punched down to long-on
around the off stump line, defended to covers
moves outside leg stump and cuts it down to deep point
around the off stump line, defended to covers
Wallop! Dilshan breaks free with a fierce whack down to the straight boundary. He charged down the track and lifted it straight over the bowler
on the leg stump line, turned to the on side
goes for the slog sweep and misses it completely

Stunner! Rob Nicol you beauty! It was walloped high hard towards wide long-on where Nicol moved across to his left  and took a lovely running lunging catch. He moved to his left and jumped behind  to grab the ball, inches from the ropes
stays back to punch it through the of side
stays back to clip it through midwicket
tucked behind square-leg for a single
goes for the big hit and misses it completely
stays back to work it to the on side for a single
banged in short outside off, upper cut down to third man for a single
turned this one to midwicket
driven through mid-on for a single
stays back to work this one past point for a single
flighted around the off stump line, pushed to short cover
goes down the track and flat bats it towards long-on .. Rob Nicols rushes in and throws in a dive and the ball just lands short of him
pulled away for yet another single
turns in to the off stump line, pushed to the off side
turns towards off stump pline, dabbed to point region
floated full outside off, it stops on the batsman and Sanga mistimes it completely back to the bowler
driven through covers for a single
Bosh! Dilshan goes down on his knee to slog-sweep it to the midwicket boundary
swings it away towards deep midwicket .. short of the fielder in the deep
goes for the big hit over covers but edges it to short third man
stays back to swat it past midwicket
leans forward to play a perfect defensive shot
Oh well he is gone. Sanga moved down the track and the ball stops a touch, also keeps low and Sanga is unable to connect with the intended big hit .. Stumped
leans forward to push it to midwicket
leans forward to drive to the off side
stays back to clip it towards deep midwicket ,.. scores are level
stays back to defend to short cover
presses back to guide to short third man
Wide down the leg side. It goes past the attempted sweep shot and past Hopkins, the keeper. Sri Lanka win by 7 wickets.
